greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Motzkin numbers A001006 read mod 5.
link: Anders Hyllengren, Letter to N. J. A. Sloane, Oct 04 1985
mathematica: b = DifferenceRoot[Function[{b, n}, {3 (n + 1) b[n] + (2 n + 5) b[n + 1] == (n + 4) b[n + 2], b[0] == 1, b[1] == 1}]];
program: vector(200, n, n--; a001006(n) % 5) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Oct 23 2015
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 14 2015
